description:
To create a video with multiple music, start with the same procedure for creating a video. Once you've added a set of photos for a particular music, proceed by selecting the button ‘Add Another Music'. Select a desired audio and add the content to be played under that music.




PS: If you do not add content (photos/text) to this extra audio, it will not be played in your video.
description_text: To create a video with multiple music, start with the same procedure for creating a video. Once you've added a set of photos for a particular music, proceed by selecting the button ‘Add Another Music'. Select a desired audio and add the content to be played under that music.            PS: If you do not add content (photos/text) to this extra audio, it will not be played in your video.
title: How to make video with multiple soundtracks ?
